name: Ball Pit
locationDescription:
-The balls within the ball pit have lost all color. From colorful red balls to a dull grey.
 	-There is partial power throughout the park making visibility poor.

name: Gift Shop
villain:
> The Balloon Dog lets out an continuous cry. 
> I cover my ears to protect from the high pitch scream.
> Then I notice I am quickly surrounded by other balloon animals.
> They grab me and carry me off.
> After what feels like hours, they drop me off.
> I notice a nearby sign...
> "Welcome to Ohio"
 Game Over.

> I quickly grab the needle and prick the Balloon Dog
> Within the rubber debris there is a silver key.
unReachableDirection:
> There are giant piles of bobble heads in the way.
> I should head in another direction.
locationDescription: The Gift Shop has balloon dog.

name: Cotton Candy Stand
villain:
> The Cotton Candy Monster did not like that. 
> The Monster grabs me and spins me in the cotton candy machine. 
> I am thrown out, and find myself near a mirror.
> I pick myself up and look into the mirror.
> I am now a Cotton Candy Monster.
Game Over.

> The Cotton Candy Monster shrivels up and turns into a pink goo. 
> I notice within the goo leftover there is a gold key.
unReachableDirection:
> It appears that there are piles of paper cones in my way.
> I should choose another direction.
locationDescription: The Cotton Candy Stand is has a monster.

name: Safe Area
unReachableDirection:
> Piles of peanuts are in the way.
> I should choose another direction.
locationDescription: The Safe Area is a Circus tent.

name: Popcorn Stand
villain:
> The Popcorn Snake is not fazed by my actions. 
> It completely coils around me, and drags me into the popcorn machine. 
> The machine is very hot, and I cannot see.
> After an what feels like an hour I burst out the machine.
> I try to move my arms and legs, but I feel no response.
> I look down, and only see a popcorn tail.
> I am now a popcorn snake.
 Game Over.

> I grab the broom and sweep up the Popcorn Snake into the trash
> I tie up the bag. 
> Within some of the leftover popcorn is a bronze key.
unReachableDirection:
> Mountains of paper bags filled with popcorn kernels are in the way.
> I should choose another direction.
locationDescription: The Popcorn Stand is where a snake is.

name: Hot Dog Stand
unReachableDirection:
> Comically large mustard bottles are in the way.
> I should choose another direction.
locationDescription: The Hot Dog Stand is where the manager lost their keys.

name: Dreamland Gate
unReachableDirection:
> There is wrought iron fencing in the way.
> I should choose another direction.
locationDescription: The Dreamland Gate is all locked up
